channel.title: [RESOLVED] Delete Old Account Create Request / Name Change
channel.description:
What happened: I made an account through the name( moparsniper ) and the email would never show up. I attempted to make another account by the name of (moparsniper1) and it worked.
I wanted to know if the name could be changed or if the old account request could be deleted so that I can change my name to (moparsniper).

item.title: [RESOLVED] Delete Old Account Create Request / Name Change
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.source: [RESOLVED] Delete Old Account Create Request / Name Change

item.title: [RESOLVED] Delete Old Account Create Request / Name Change
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
No idea why this thread was never answeredâ€¦

However, it is possible to change your account name through the in-game My Account tab.
